name: Main menu stays open
precondition: Run these tests on https://mysql.test.mattermost.com/

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P4 - Low-Impact (Edge or unsuitable to repeat?)
customFields.Cypress Reports: RELEASE - TM4J-Key-Mapped-In-Cypress-Release - TM4J key found Cypress release run report  (SDET/QA)

inline.description:
Main menu stays open
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Log into the same server as two different users A and user B
  2. Navigate to the same team and channel with both users
  3. As user A, open User menu by clicking on the user avatar in the global header
  4. As user B, post a message in the channel both users are viewing

customFields.Related ticket(s): (Story) UI Automation: Write an automated test using Cypress for "Main Menu stays open" — MM-15009
